BE.name: Super Mario Kart™
BE.description: Faites vrombir vos moteurs et découvrez le premier jeu culte de cette série toujours aussi populaire ! Retrouvez les personnages du Royaume Champignon, tels que Mario et Bowser, mais aussi Donkey Kong Jr. pour son unique apparition dans ce jeu de karting. Faites chauffer la gomme sur la piste de circuits désormais incontournables, comme le Circuit Mario, le Château de Bowser, la Plage Koopa ou encore la très redoutée Route Arc-en-ciel ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CH.name: Super Mario Kart™
CH.description: Lasst die Motoren im legendären Super Mario Kart erklingen, dem Urvater der erfolgreichsten Rennspielserie. Wähle einen von acht Fahrern aus dem Pilzkönigreich, von alten Bekannten wie Mario und Bowser über Donkey Kong Jr., der hier seinen einzigen Serienauftritt hat. Gib Gummi auf klassischen Rennstrecken wie Marios Piste, Bowsers Festung, Koopa-Strand und dem berüchtigten Regenbogen-Boulevard! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AT.name: Super Mario Kart™
AT.description: Lasst die Motoren im legendären Super Mario Kart erklingen, dem Urvater der erfolgreichsten Rennspielserie. Wähle einen von acht Fahrern aus dem Pilzkönigreich, von alten Bekannten wie Mario und Bowser über Donkey Kong Jr., der hier seinen einzigen Serienauftritt hat. Gib Gummi auf klassischen Rennstrecken wie Marios Piste, Bowsers Festung, Koopa-Strand und dem berüchtigten Regenbogen-Boulevard! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Super Mario Kart™
AU.description: Start your engines for the original, legendary Super Mario Kart; which spawned a series that is still going strong today. Choose from eight Mushroom Kingdom characters – from familiar faces like Mario and Bowser, to Donkey Kong Jr. in his only karting appearance. Burn rubber across classic courses like Mario Circuit, Bowser Castle, Koopa Beach and the infamous Rainbow Road! This is the US version of the game.

BR.name: Super Mario Kart™
BR.description: Selecione um de oito personagens da série do Mario™ — cada um oferece um estilo de corrida diferente — e participe de três campeonatos em três classes de kart diferentes. Conquiste um número de vitórias suficiente e você desbloqueará um quarto circuito: a dificílima Special Cup. Cruzar a linha de chegada em primeiro lugar não será uma tarefa fácil, uma vez que cada pista possui obstáculos únicos e os pilotos podem obter power-ups especiais que os impulsionam à vitória. Com mais de 15 pistas para dominar e com um valor de repetição quase infinito, Super Mario Kart é um jogo clássico... com algumas cascas de banana jogadas para diversão na medida certa.

CY.name: Super Mario Kart™
CY.description: Start your engines for the original, legendary Super Mario Kart; which spawned a series that is still going strong today. Choose from eight Mushroom Kingdom characters – from familiar faces like Mario and Bowser, to Donkey Kong Jr. in his only karting appearance. Burn rubber across classic courses like Mario Circuit, Bowser Castle, Koopa Beach and the infamous Rainbow Road! This is the US version of the game.

CA.name: Super Mario Kart™
CA.description: Select one of eight characters from the Mario™ series—offering a variety of driving styles—and take on three championship cups in three different kart classes. Win enough, and you’ll unlock a fourth circuit: the ultra-tough Special Cup. Crossing the finish line in first place isn’t an easy task, though, as each track has unique obstacles to conquer and racers can obtain special power-ups that boost them to victory. With more than 15 tracks to master and nearly endless replay value, Super Mario Kart is classic gaming…with some banana peels thrown in for good measure!

MT.name: Super Mario Kart™
MT.description: Start your engines for the original, legendary Super Mario Kart; which spawned a series that is still going strong today. Choose from eight Mushroom Kingdom characters – from familiar faces like Mario and Bowser, to Donkey Kong Jr. in his only karting appearance. Burn rubber across classic courses like Mario Circuit, Bowser Castle, Koopa Beach and the infamous Rainbow Road! This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Super Mario Kart™
MX.description: Selecciona uno de los ocho personajes del mundo de Mario™, cada uno con su propio estilo de manejar, y corre en tres circuitos diferentes con tres niveles de dificultad. Si ganas suficientes carreras, podrás desbloquear un cuarto circuito: la dificilísima Copa Especial. No será nada fácil llegar a la meta, ya que cada pista dispone de diferentes obstáculos que habrá que sortear y los corredores podrán obtener objetos que los propulsarán a la victoria. Con más de 15 pistas en las que podrás jugar una y otra vez, Super Mario Kart te ofrece un estilo de juego clásico... ¡y alguna cáscara de plátano, por si fuera poco!

PL.name: Super Mario Kart™
PL.description: Start your engines for the original, legendary Super Mario Kart; which spawned a series that is still going strong today. Choose from eight Mushroom Kingdom characters – from familiar faces like Mario and Bowser, to Donkey Kong Jr. in his only karting appearance. Burn rubber across classic courses like Mario Circuit, Bowser Castle, Koopa Beach and the infamous Rainbow Road! This is the US version of the game.

Burn rubber across classic courses like Mario Circuit, Bowser Castle, Koopa Beach and the infamous Rainbow Road! This is the US version of the game.

LU.name: Super Mario Kart™
LU.description: Faites vrombir vos moteurs et découvrez le premier jeu culte de cette série toujours aussi populaire ! Retrouvez les personnages du Royaume Champignon, tels que Mario et Bowser, mais aussi Donkey Kong Jr. pour son unique apparition dans ce jeu de karting. Faites chauffer la gomme sur la piste de circuits désormais incontournables, comme le Circuit Mario, le Château de Bowser, la Plage Koopa ou encore la très redoutée Route Arc-en-ciel ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

PT.name: Super Mario Kart™
PT.description: Liguem os vossos motores para o original e lendário Super Mario Kart, que marcou o início de uma série cuja popularidade ainda se mantém. Escolhe a partir de oito personagens do Mushroom Kingdom: caras conhecidas como Mario e Bowser, ou mesmo Donkey Kong Jr. na sua única aparição em corridas de karts. Queima borracha em pistas clássicas como Mario Circuit, Bowser Castle, Koopa Beach e a infame Rainbow Road! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Super Mario Kart™
RU.description: Прогревайте двигатель! Вас ждет тот самый первый, легендарный Super Mario Kart — родоначальник серии, которая дожила до наших дней и нисколько не утратила популярности. Выберите для игры одного из восьми обитателей Mushroom Kingdom, от известных всем Марио и Боузера до Донки Конга-младшего (он появился только в этой игре гоночной серии). Покорите классические трассы: «Трассу Марио», «Замок Боузера», «Пляж Купа Трупа» и печально известную «Радугу»! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

LT.name: Super Mario Kart™
LT.description: Start your engines for the original, legendary Super Mario Kart; which spawned a series that is still going strong today. Choose from eight Mushroom Kingdom characters – from familiar faces like Mario and Bowser, to Donkey Kong Jr. in his only karting appearance. Burn rubber across classic courses like Mario Circuit, Bowser Castle, Koopa Beach and the infamous Rainbow Road! This is the US version of the game.

ES.name: Super Mario Kart™
ES.description: ¡Arranca motores con el único e inimitable Super Mario Kart, el fantástico juego que inició la saga que sigue dando caña! Elige entre ocho personajes del Reino Champiñón, desde los habituales Mario y Bowser hasta otros que aparecen en exclusiva como Donkey Kong Jr. ¡Quema la pista en circuitos de siempre como el Circuito Mario, el Castillo de Bowser, Playa Koopa y la temida Senda Arco Iris! Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

RO.name: Super Mario Kart™
RO.description: Start your engines for the original, legendary Super Mario Kart; which spawned a series that is still going strong today. Choose from eight Mushroom Kingdom characters – from familiar faces like Mario and Bowser, to Donkey Kong Jr. in his only karting appearance. Burn rubber across classic courses like Mario Circuit, Bowser Castle, Koopa Beach and the infamous Rainbow Road! This is the US version of the game.

SI.name: Super Mario Kart™
SI.description: Start your engines for the original, legendary Super Mario Kart; which spawned a series that is still going strong today. Choose from eight Mushroom Kingdom characters – from familiar faces like Mario and Bowser, to Donkey Kong Jr. in his only karting appearance. Burn rubber across classic courses like Mario Circuit, Bowser Castle, Koopa Beach and the infamous Rainbow Road! This is the US version of the game.

US.name: Super Mario Kart™
US.description: Select one of eight characters from the Mario™ series—offering a variety of driving styles—and take on three championship cups in three different kart classes. Win enough, and you’ll unlock a fourth circuit: the ultra-tough Special Cup. Crossing the finish line in first place isn’t an easy task, though, as each track has unique obstacles to conquer and racers can obtain special power-ups that boost them to victory. With more than 15 tracks to master and nearly endless replay value, Super Mario Kart is classic gaming…with some banana peels thrown in for good measure!

ZA.name: Super Mario Kart™
ZA.description: Start your engines for the original, legendary Super Mario Kart; which spawned a series that is still going strong today. Choose from eight Mushroom Kingdom characters – from familiar faces like Mario and Bowser, to Donkey Kong Jr. in his only karting appearance. Burn rubber across classic courses like Mario Circuit, Bowser Castle, Koopa Beach and the infamous Rainbow Road! This is the US version of the game.

IT.name: Super Mario Kart™
IT.description: Avvia i motori e divertiti con il leggendario Super Mario Kart, titolo precursore di una serie ancora oggi in cima alle classifiche. Scegli uno degli otto personaggi del Regno dei Funghi: dai famosissimi Mario e Bowser a Donkey Kong Jr., che in questo titolo farà la sua prima e ultima apparizione su kart. Preparati a sgommare su circuiti che sono diventati un classico, come il Circuito di Mario, il Castello di Boswer, la Spiaggia Koopa oppure l'insidiosa Pista Arcobaleno! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Super Mario Kart™
NL.description: Ronk je motor voor het oorspronkelijke, legendarische Super Mario Kart dat aan de wieg stond van een reeks die niets aan kracht heeft ingeboet. Kies uit acht geliefde personages uit het Mushroom Kingdom – van oude bekenden zoals Mario en Bowser tot Donkey Kong Jr., die alleen in dit deel van de Mario Kart-reeks opduikt. Scheur over klassieke circuits als Mario Circuit, Bowser Castle, Koopa Beach en het beruchte Rainbow Road! Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

SK.name: Super Mario Kart™
SK.description: Start your engines for the original, legendary Super Mario Kart; which spawned a series that is still going strong today. Choose from eight Mushroom Kingdom characters – from familiar faces like Mario and Bowser, to Donkey Kong Jr. in his only karting appearance. Burn rubber across classic courses like Mario Circuit, Bowser Castle, Koopa Beach and the infamous Rainbow Road! This is the US version of the game.
